organisation-page.title: Organisation
organisation-page.description: View and edit users, locations and company information.

tabs-admin.user-limit-reached: You've reached the maximum number of users for your plan.
tabs-admin.user-upgrade-plan: Upgrade your plan to add more users.
tabs-admin.location-limit-reached: You've reached the maximum number of locations for your plan.
tabs-admin.location-upgrade-plan: Upgrade your plan to add more locations.

modal-toggle-user.title: Change user status
modal-toggle-user.description1: This action is not permanent. If you activate a user, they will be able to log in to
modal-toggle-user.description2: again. If you deactivate a user, they will be logged out and will not be able to log in again until reactivated.

modal-reset-userpw.title: Reset user password
modal-reset-userpw.description: This action sends a mail to the user, with a link to reset their password.

modal-edit-location.title: Update location
modal-edit-location.description: Here you can edit a location's name and access-level for your users.
modal-edit-location.create-more-users: Create more users to assign access rights when editing locations.
modal-edit-location.own-user: You cannot edit your own users location accesses, hence why its not shown here.

modal-toggle-location.title: Change location status
modal-toggle-location.description: This action is not permanent. If you activate a location, it can be accessed again. If you deactivate a location, it can no longer be accessed until it is reactivated.

modal-invite-user.title: Invite new user
modal-invite-user.description: Send an activation email to one of your employees to quickly get them started using
modal-invite-user.email-placeholder: Write email for the new user
modal-invite-user.role-question: What can the roles do? Read more on our
modal-invite-user.role-url: what can the user roles do?
modal-invite-user.user-rights-web: User must have access to web
modal-invite-user.user-rights-app: User must have access to app
modal-invite-user.user-rights-prices: User must have access to view prices

modal-create-location.title: Create new location
modal-create-location.description: New locations can be accessed immediately in the dropdown menu in the top right corner.
modal-create-location.create-more-users: Create more users to assign access rights when creating locations.
modal-create-location.own-user: Your own user will automatically get access to this location, hence why its not shown here.

modal-edit-user.title: Edit user
modal-edit-user.description: Here you can edit a user's name and access levels.
modal-edit-user.user-not-found-description: The user could not be found, please try again
modal-edit-user.create-more-locations: Create more locations to assign access rights when editing users.

validation.name_one: Name must be at least {{count}} character
validation.name_other: Name must be at least {{count}} characters
validation.locationIDs_one: At least {{count}} location must be selected
validation.locationIDs_other: At least {{count}} locations must be selected
